src:
Rekomendasi Makan Malam
Gyoza Enak dan Gurih Bisa Dinikmati di 5 Tempat Ini
05 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Foto: Rocketnews24

Jakarta - Gyoza merupakan pangsit khas Jepang dengan isian daging cincang dan sayuran. Kalau mau coba gyoza enak, mampir saja ke 5 tempat ini.Gyoza disukai banyak orang karena rasanya gurih dengan tekstur empuk. Gyoza dibuat dari kulit pangsit dengan isian daging cincang, daun bawang, kubis, dan bawang putih. Gyoza lalu dinikmati dengan cocolan soy sauce.Meski aslinya dari Jepang, gyoza mudah ditemui di Jakarta. Ada tempat menikmati gyoza enak yang bisa disambangi malam ini. Mampir, yuk!1. Toyofuku


Foto: detikFood

Foto: dok. detikFoodAEON Mall menawarkan banyak makanan khas Jepang yang nikmat. Tak terkecuali untuk gyoza yang dihadirkan Toyofuku di Food Culture. Gyoza di sini dibuat fresh setiap hari. Bisa dinikmati sebagai menu porsi atau paket bersama ramen.Gyoza buatan Toyofuku berisi cincangan daging ayam, irisan kol, dan jamur shitake. Teksturnya kenyal dengan rasa gurih yang pas. Pendampingnya tentu saja cocolan soy sauce. Untuk paket gyoza tersedia dalam isian 5 dan 12.ToyofukuAEON Mall, Lantai Ground, Food Culture, Jl. BSD Raya Utama, SerpongBaca Juga: Toyofuku: Empuk Gurih Gyoza dengan Paduan Ramen Tantan Ada di Sini 2. Gyoza Oriental Cuisine


Foto: Istimewa

Foto: stellachubbySesuai namanya, restoran ini menawarkan gyoza sebagai menu andalan. Per porsinya berisi 10 buah gyoza. Bisa digoreng, goreng kering, atau rebus. Untuk isiannya ada daging babi/sapi dan sayur serta tahu.Harga per porsi gyoza di sini Rp 80.000. Banyak orang menyukai cita rasanya yang empuk gurih. Selain gyoza, Gyoza Oriental Cuisine juga tawarkan ragam bakmi, olahan daging ayam, dan daging sapi.Gyoza Oriental CuisineMenara Anugrah, Lantai Ground, Jl. Lingkar Mega KuninganTelepon: 021 57643943. Osaka Ohsho


Foto: dok. detikFood

Foto: dok. detikFoodDari Osaka, Jepang, restoran ini menawarkan gyoza sebagai menu andalan. Sudah sejak 1969, Osaka Ohsho membuat gyoza yang jadi favorit banyak orang. Di Jakarta, cabangnya ada di Grand Indonesia dan Plaza Senayan.Gyoza tersedia dalam pilihan Original Gyoza atau Cheese Gyoza. Untuk olahannya bisa dipanggang atau digoreng. Sedangkan isiannya, bisa memilih gyoza daging ayam, daging babi, atau daging udang plus ayam. Kalau mau isi banyak, ada kemasan Party isi 25 atau 50.Osaka OhshoGrand Indonesia Mall, Lantai 3A, West Mall, Jl. MH ThamrinTelepon: 021 23580060Baca Juga: Osaka Ohsho: Ada Tenshinhan dan Gyoza Enak Gaya Osaka 4. Sushi Hiro


Ilustrasi: Rocketnews24

Foto: IstimewaPunya belasan cabang di Jakarta, Sushi Hiro juga bisa jadi tujuan saat Anda ingin makan gyoza enak. Menilik menunya, gyoza masuk dalam daftar appetizer. Harganya Rp 40.000 sampai Rp 45.000.Ada pilihan gyoza, gyoza mentai, dan gyoza cheese. Tiap porsi gyoza berisi 5 buah. Dari kategori yang sama juga ada chawan mushi yang sayang dilewatkan.Sushi HiroNeo SOHO Mall, Lantai Upper GroundJl. Suryo No. 24, Senopati5. Tokyo Belly


Ilustrasi: detikFood

Foto: dok. detikFoodTokyo Belly menawarkan ragam menu Jepang fusion. Pilihan gyozanya lumayan banyak seperti gyoza chicken, gyoza mentaiko sauce, gyoza chicken mozzarella, dan gyoza curry sauce.Harganya mulai dari Rp 20.000 sampai Rp 25.000. Satu porsinya berisi 5 buah gyoza. Pencinta gyoza tentu patut mencoba ragam sajian gyoza di sini.Tokyo BellyGrand Indonesia Mall, Lantai 3A, West MallSimak Video "Mexican Tuna Salad dan Salad Roll yang Segar dan Bikin Sehat"[Gambas:Video 20detik](adr/odi)
text:
Dinner Recommendation
Tasty and Delicious Gyoza Can Be Enjoyed in These 5 Places
05 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Photo: Rocketnews24

Jakarta - Gyoza is a typical Japanese dumpling filled with minced meat and vegetables. If you want to try the delicious gyoza, just stop by these 5 places. Gyoza is liked by many people because it tastes delicious with a soft texture. Gyoza is made from dumpling skin with stuffed minced meat, leeks, cabbage and garlic. Gyoza is then enjoyed with a soy sauce sauce. Although originally from Japan, gyoza is easily found in Jakarta. There's a place to enjoy good gyoza that can be visited tonight. Come on, let's go! Toyofuku


Photo: detikFood

Photo: dock. detikFoodAEON Mall offers a lot of delicious Japanese specialties. No exception for the gyoza that Toyofuku presented at Food Culture. Gyoza is made fresh here everyday. Can be enjoyed as a serving menu or package with ramen. Toyyo-made gyoza contains minced chicken, sliced cabbage, and shitake mushrooms. Chewy texture with the right savory taste. The companion is of course, soy sauce sauce. The gyoza package is available in entries 5 and 12. Toyofuku AEON Mall, Ground Floor, Food Culture, Jl. BSD Raya Utama, Serpong Also Read: Toyofuku: Savory Gyoza Savory with Tantan Ramen Alloy is Here 2. Gyoza Oriental Cuisine


Photo: Special

Photo: Stellachubby As the name implies, this restaurant offers gyoza as a mainstay menu. Per portion contains 10 gyoza. Can be fried, fried dry, or boiled. For stuffing there is pork / beef and vegetables and tofu. Price per serving of gyoza here is Rp. 80,000. Many people like the taste that is soft and tasty. Besides gyoza, Gyoza Oriental Cuisine also offers a variety of noodles, processed chicken, and beef. Gyoza Oriental Cuisine Anugrah Tower, Ground Floor, Jl. Lingkar Mega Kuningan Phone: 021 57643943. Osaka Ohsho


Photo: dock. detikFood

Photo: dock. detikFood From Osaka, Japan, this restaurant offers gyoza as a mainstay menu. Since 1969, Osaka Ohsho has made gyoza a favorite of many people. In Jakarta, the branches are at Grand Indonesia and Plaza Senayan. Gyoza is available in a choice of Original Gyoza or Cheese Gyoza. For processing can be baked or fried. While the contents, can choose chicken, pork, or shrimp plus chicken. If you want to fill a lot, there are packs of Party contents 25 or 50.Osaka OhshoGrand Indonesia Mall, 3rd Floor, West Mall, Jl. MH Thamrin Phone: 021 23580060 Also Read: Osaka Ohsho: There are Tenshinhan and Gyoza Tasty Osaka Style 4. Sushi Hiro


Illustration: Rocketnews24

Photo: Special Having dozens of branches in Jakarta, Sushi Hiro can also be a destination when you want to eat tasty gyoza. Judging by the menu, Gyoza entered the appetizer list. The price is Rp 40,000 to Rp 45,000. There is a choice of gyoza, gyoza mentai, and gyoza cheese. Each portion of gyoza contains 5 pieces. From the same category there is also the Chawan Mushi which is unfortunately missed. Sushi HiroNeo SOHO Mall, Upper Ground Floor JL. Suryo No. 24, Senopati5. Tokyo Belly


Illustration: detikFood

Photo: dock. detikFoodTokyo Belly offers a variety of Japanese fusion menus. The choice of gyoza is pretty much like gyoza chicken, gyoza mentaiko sauce, gyoza chicken mozzarella, and gyoza curry sauce. Prices start from IDR 20,000 to IDR 25,000. One portion contains 5 gyoza. Gyoza lovers certainly deserve to try various gyoza offerings here. Tokyo BellyGrand Indonesia Mall, 3rd Floor, West Mall Watch Video "Fresh and Healthy Mexican Tuna Salad and Salad Roll" [Gambas: Video 20second] (adr / odi)
